text: The 1938 Manhattan Jaspers football team was an American football team that represented Manhattan College as an independent during the 1938 college football season. In its first season under head coach Herb Kopf, the team compiled a 5–4 record and outscored opponents by a total of 93 to 70. ==Schedule== ==References== Manhattan Category:Manhattan Jaspers football seasons Manhattan Jaspers football
title: 1938 Manhattan Jaspers football team
